content: **knitted top in drops muskat the piece is worked bottom up in stocking stitch with a flounce-edge sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern r-792 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 300-300-350-350-400-450 g colour 09 nutmeg drops mother of pearl buttons arched white no 521 1 item in all sizes needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 60-60-60-80-80-80 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 60-60-60-80-80-80 cm **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
